nodes.text: Eekar Oki was a Mon Calamari male Jedi who lived during the Clone Wars.
Eekar Oki, a Mon Calamari male, served as a Jedi during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, during the Clone Wars.

Oki was present among other Jedi to revive a threatening message from the Separatist General Grievous, who had captured Jedi Master Eeth Koth after a space battle near the Arda system, where Koth's ship had been boarded by the cyborg general. Grievous, torturing Koth for all to see, gave a threatening warning, but failed to notice a series of hand signals from Koth, which gave away his position, so the Jedi could liberate him from Separatist capture.

Later during the war, the Galactic Senate to deregulate the Republic's banks, and, following the vote, Oki spoke with fellow Jedi Anakin Skywalker inside the Senate Building on Coruscant. The Mon Calamari Jedi was also present when Jedi Padawans Ahsoka Tano, Jinx and O-Mer arrived on Coruscant after they were rescued by a group of Wookiees from imprisonment on the Trandoshan moon Wasskah.

After the bombing of the Jedi Temple, Oki, alongside many Jedi, Senators, and Republic personnel, attended the funeral of those killed in the attack, five Jedi among them. Later, the true assailant behind the bombing was revealed to be Barriss Offee.
